metadata.title: CVE-2021-33195 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Go before 1.15.13 and 1.16.x before 1.16.5 has functions for DNS lookups that do not validate replies from DNS servers, and thus a return value may contain an unsafe injection (e.g., XSS) that does not conform to the RFC1035 format.

criterions.comment: golang-1.15 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.16 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
